00017 #ifndef B3_GRAHAM_SCAN_2D_CONVEX_HULL_H
00018 #define B3_GRAHAM_SCAN_2D_CONVEX_HULL_H
00019 
00020 
00021 #include "Bullet3Common/b3Vector3.h"
00022 #include "Bullet3Common/b3AlignedObjectArray.h"
00023 
00024 struct b3GrahamVector3 : public b3Vector3
00025 {
00026         b3GrahamVector3(const b3Vector3& org, int orgIndex)
00027                 :b3Vector3(org),
00028                         m_orgIndex(orgIndex)
00029         {
00030         }
00031         b3Scalar        m_angle;
00032         int m_orgIndex;
00033 };
00034 
00035 
00036 struct b3AngleCompareFunc {
00037         b3Vector3 m_anchor;
00038         b3AngleCompareFunc(const b3Vector3& anchor)
00039         : m_anchor(anchor) 
00040         {
00041         }
00042         bool operator()(const b3GrahamVector3& a, const b3GrahamVector3& b) const {
00043                 if (a.m_angle != b.m_angle)
00044                         return a.m_angle < b.m_angle;
00045                 else
00046                 {
00047                         b3Scalar al = (a-m_anchor).length2();
00048                         b3Scalar bl = (b-m_anchor).length2();
00049                         if (al != bl)
00050                                 return  al < bl;
00051                         else
00052                         {
00053                                 return a.m_orgIndex < b.m_orgIndex;
00054                         }
00055                 }
00056         }
00057 };
00058 
00059 inline void b3GrahamScanConvexHull2D(b3AlignedObjectArray<b3GrahamVector3>& originalPoints, b3AlignedObjectArray<b3GrahamVector3>& hull, const b3Vector3& normalAxis)
00060 {
00061         b3Vector3 axis0,axis1;
00062         b3PlaneSpace1(normalAxis,axis0,axis1);
00063         
00064 
00065         if (originalPoints.size()<=1)
00066         {
00067                 for (int i=0;i<originalPoints.size();i++)
00068                         hull.push_back(originalPoints[0]);
00069                 return;
00070         }
00071         //step1 : find anchor point with smallest projection on axis0 and move it to first location
00072         for (int i=0;i<originalPoints.size();i++)
00073         {
00074 //              const b3Vector3& left = originalPoints[i];
00075 //              const b3Vector3& right = originalPoints[0];
00076                 b3Scalar projL = originalPoints[i].dot(axis0);
00077                 b3Scalar projR = originalPoints[0].dot(axis0);
00078                 if (projL < projR)
00079                 {
00080                         originalPoints.swap(0,i);
00081                 }
00082         }
00083 
00084         //also precompute angles
00085         originalPoints[0].m_angle = -1e30f;
00086         for (int i=1;i<originalPoints.size();i++)
00087         {
00088                 b3Vector3 xvec = axis0;
00089                 b3Vector3 ar = originalPoints[i]-originalPoints[0];
00090                 originalPoints[i].m_angle = b3Cross(xvec, ar).dot(normalAxis) / ar.length();
00091         }
00092 
00093         //step 2: sort all points, based on 'angle' with this anchor
00094         b3AngleCompareFunc comp(originalPoints[0]);
00095         originalPoints.quickSortInternal(comp,1,originalPoints.size()-1);
00096 
00097         int i;
00098         for (i = 0; i<2; i++) 
00099                 hull.push_back(originalPoints[i]);
00100 
00101         //step 3: keep all 'convex' points and discard concave points (using back tracking)
00102         for (; i != originalPoints.size(); i++) 
00103         {
00104                 bool isConvex = false;
00105                 while (!isConvex&& hull.size()>1) {
00106                         b3Vector3& a = hull[hull.size()-2];
00107                         b3Vector3& b = hull[hull.size()-1];
00108                         isConvex = b3Cross(a-b,a-originalPoints[i]).dot(normalAxis)> 0;
00109                         if (!isConvex)
00110                                 hull.pop_back();
00111                         else 
00112                                 hull.push_back(originalPoints[i]);
00113                 }
00114         }
00115 }
00116 
00117 #endif //B3_GRAHAM_SCAN_2D_CONVEX_HULL_H
